
0-1600 :: 0-80 80-1520 1520-1600 :: Alignment Frame
1520-3120 :: Blank Frame
3040-4640 :: 3080-3120 3120-4560 4560-4600 :: 0th frame
4560-6160 :: 4600-4640 4640-6080 6080-6160 :: 1st frame
6080-7680 :: 6120-6160 6160



'''
chr22 0 1600 bad_apple 1000 . 0 1600 0 1 1600 0
chr22 3119 4561 bad_apple 1000 . 3119 4561 0 2 1,1 0,1441
chr22 4639 6081 bad_apple 1000 . 4639 6081 0 2 1,1 0,1441
'''
